title: How AHS: 1984 Should Have Ended
author: Think Story
comment: If this video gets 10K likes I will write an ending where Chef Bertie is the hero! Seriously though, thanks everyone for watching my breakdowns this season. This video is just for fun :)
Emma Roberts’ Brooke marrying Evan Peters’ Billy Idol ... you petty

I always saw Jingles as THEE main character.
He had one of the biggest arcs from
1. troubled childhood
2. framed for murder
Honestly this would’ve been such a good ending ! They need to make you a writer for the show lol
This show is good but they aren't great at wrapping things up imo. Just like the other season where the climax of killing the ultimate villain is running him over in a car
description:
I was a little less than excited about how American Horror Story's 9th season, "1984" ended. So I put this video together explaining some of my frustrations and offer an alternate ending.
